name: Sahil Khan
college: Maulana Azad National Institute Of Technology

education.school: Maulana Azad National Institute Of Technology

projects.name: EEG Brain Signal Detection And Classification
projects.description: 1-D CNN is used for classification and the model developed in this project has achieved a training accuracy of 83.08 % and a testing accuracy of 82.67 %. Currently working on integrating TinyML techniques to deploy the trained CNN model onto low-power microcontrollers, aiming to enable real-time EEG brain signal detection and classification on resource-constrained devices such as wearable EEG headsets.

projects.name: Expense Tracker (MERN Application)
projects.description: Engineered expense platform managing 10,000+ transactions, streamlining tracking for hundreds. Added, deleted, updated, and retrieved transactions, reducing financial tasks by 30%. MERN stack for 50% more responsive architecture. Material UI boosted user retention by 40%. Intuitive UI cut errors by 25% in transaction input.

projects.name: ByteLink Chat (Chat Application using Socket Programming)
projects.description: Developed a chat application using C++ and Socket Programming for real-time communication over a network. Implemented blocking and non-blocking calls, resulting in a 40% boost in connection handling efficiency. Utilized threading for concurrent client-server interactions, improving scalability by 60%. Thread pool implementation slashed overhead by 40%, boosting application performance.

experiences.description: Provided valuable insights and ideas, enhancing team capabilities by 30%. Consistently met project deadlines, ensuring timely delivery of tasks, contributing to overall project efficiency by 25%. Executed various web projects, including a landing page, portfolio website, and food delivery application, showcasing versatility and adaptability. Demonstrated proficiency in Node.js, React, CSS, JavaScript, HTML, and API concepts, resulting in the development user-friendly web applications.
